title: Discuss amongst yourselves
author: VD
content_html:
A few things:

1. I KNEW I should have started Jones-Drew. I agonized over that one for about five minutes and finally went with Marion Barber III.

2. The Original Cyberpunk located my last formatting issue with the WRATH document, so that’s uploading to the printer now. They claim 7-10 working days, so if you want one of the very first run, contact K&B this week.

3. While there’s no foreign demand for my books, the same is not true of other authors in the house….
content_text:
A few things:
1.  I KNEW I should have started Jones-Drew.  I agonized over that one for about five minutes and finally went with Marion Barber III.
2.  The Original Cyberpunk located my last formatting issue with the WRATH document, so that’s uploading to the printer now.  They claim 7-10 working days, so if you want one of the very first run, contact K&B this week.
3.  While there’s no foreign demand for my books, the same is not true of other authors in the house….
